- Cybersecurity is about protecting against cyberattacks.\n - Cybersecurity tries to protect your systems, devices, and data from different types of attacks, like viruses and ransomware.\n - It is important to have cybersecurity measures in place to keep your information safe.

Cybersecurity means using technology, methods, and rules to stop cyberattacks or reduce their effects. It helps keep people and organizations safe by defending their systems, programs, computers, important information, and money from different types of threats such as viruses and ransomware attacks.

Cybersecurity is about protecting our devices and information from digital attacks. This includes things like computer viruses or ransomware, which can harm our systems or steal our data. Its purpose is to keep us safe from these online threats.
